mean_cn: v.移种（植物等）；移居；移植（器官)
mean_en: to take an organ, skin, etc. from one person, animal, part of the body, etc. and put it into or onto another; to move a growing plant and plant it somewhere else; to move somebody/something to a different place or environment
sentence: The houseplant growing in a pot was transplanted to the garden.
sentence_trans: 盆里的植物被移种到了花园里。
word_etyma: trans转移 + plant种植 → transplant移植
